hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh

Interface TriangleListIterator


  • public interface TriangleListIterator
    An iterator over a list of triangles. Works similarly as Iterator. The vertices of the trianges are available after calls to the next() method.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector3 getV1()
      Return the first vertex of the current triangle.
      Vector3 getV2()
      Return the second vertex of the current triangle.
      Vector3 getV3()
      Return the third vertex of the current triangle.
      boolean hasNext()
      Returns true if the iteration has more triangles.
      void next()
      Moves to the next element in the iteration.
